overview:
Since the mid Nineties, Steffen has researched and worked in the interface of financial markets and private sector development: as founder of two successful companies (a technology venture in Berlin and a dried fruit producer in Uganda), as management consultant for financial institutions (Accenture, b&m management and PricewaterhouseCoopers) and as development consultant in Africa (UNDP).

Steffen has an academic background in Economics and Philosophy (Freie UniversitÃ¤t Berlin and Carlos III de Madrid).

He is author of various studies on financial markets and small and medium-sized businesses and currently acts as Swiss correspondent manager for the Foundation of German Business.

At present, Steffen is managing partner of Verve Capital Partners (Zurich), co-founder of investiere.ch and co-author of the blog investorsparadigm.org.
